alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lemhi County; Western Lemhi County (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued July 17 at 1:29PM MDT until July 18 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 8 PM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. The strongest winds are expected south of Leadore. * WHERE...Shoup, Bannock Pass, Highway 28 Tendoy to Lone Pine, Highway 93 Lost Trail Pass to Gibbonsville, Lemhi Pass, and Salmon. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 8 PM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Lemhi County; Western Lemhi County
